inn1.comm: extravagant seam movement away from the left-hander, pitches outside off stump and moves a good degree, left alone as three slips wait warming their fingers
pitches outside leg stump and Porterfield shapes to flick down leg, but leg-byes is the signal from umpire Benson as Ireland are on the board
nice shot, just a dab as he comes forward to a straighter one on the stumps and flicks across the pads into the gat at midwicket
good comeback delivery, pitching fuller outside off stump and sucking Carroll into a forward defensive, only to shape away and beat his prod
drifts down leg stump and Carroll nudges that around the corner to fine leg, no swing on that ball this time
pitches on a good length just outside off stump and Porterfield comes forward and nicely defends that towards mid-off
good ball first up, in-swinger that lands on about leg stump and moves in, rapping him on the pad but umpire thinks there was a bit of inside-edge on that, hmmm...close shout
fullish outside off stump and thats a nice drive into the covers, but cant beat the man
a tad slower this time and Carroll checks his drive to mid-off this time
full on off stump and once again Carroll impresses with a neat little push into that gap at midwicket for a couple
this one's shorter and moving away well outside off stump, no swing back in for RP and wide is the call from the umpire

lands on leg stump and swings in, Carroll gets outside his crease with a big stride forward to counter the movement, RP and Co appeal but Bowden shakes his head, not a bad shout again but doing too much
fuller and slower outside off stump and he has to reach out and poke that to point
good ball on a length outside off stump is met with an equally impressive forward push, straight bat et al, back to Sreesanth
back of a length outside off stump, Porterfield opens the face of the bat and picks the gap wide of third slip for one down to fine leg
full and swinging in from outside off stump and he plays out in front of his pad, rolling the wrists and finding the gap behind square, good running from these two
a little wider of off stump this time, and he comes out a good distance and plays that along the ground to point
good ball from Sreesanth, seeing Carroll step out of his crease and changing the pace and length, forcing a forward defensive back down the ground
this one nips back off a shorter length outside leg stump and catches him high on the thigh, Carroll was again looking to make room and use the feet
good stuff, landing on a length outside off stump and leaving Porterfield as he stands and defends, then manages to withdraw the bat at the nth second
too straight on the pads, he flicks nicely but cant beat Chawla at backward square leg
lands on a good length just outside off stump and its defended to the off side, Porterfield not as keen as his partner with that front foot
pitches outside leg and gets some lift this time as Porterfield shuffles across in an attempt to work it fine, ball ends up catching him on the thigh
slower through the air and full and he drives to Gambhir at mid-off
dragged in short on off stump and in a flash Porterfield's into his pull shot, placing it well behind square to pick up his first four, and Ireland's too

edged and taken by a diving Karthik! Was fullish and leaving Carroll, who drove loosely while not to the pitch and the thick outside edge was snapped up beautifully by the 'keeper, diving to his right and plucking it in front of Tendulkar at first slip
good length outside off stump, moving in as Joyce shoulders arms to it
full on the stumps, Joyce plays across the line and gets beaten by the extra pace, and saved by the inside-edge
good movement off the seam again, pitching it outside off stump and moving it away from Joyce's bat as he fishes outside off stump
a tad slower, but still full outside off stump, and its driven on the bounce to mid-off
good length outside off stump, Joyce gets forward and drops the hands on it, stealing a quick single into the covers
short and wide, he stands and flashes a huge cut at it and misses, and the ball drops low before Karthik too
short of a length outside off stump, moving away, and he leaves it be
nippy delivery, pitching on a length outside off stump and catching Joyce high on the front leg, was clearly going over the stumps
angled wider across the batsman, who plants the front foot out and shoulders arms
just a touch fuller from RP, who gets it to move in and once again rap Joyce on the front leg, but the ball was again going over top of the stumps
fuller and angling across the stumps, Joyce watches it carefully this time and leaves it be for Karthik
good length just outside off stump and its pushed comfortably to mid-off
short of a length this time and he waits for it and pushes to the man at mid-off again
straighter delivery on off stump, Porterfield whips it to square leg
fuller, perhaps a touch slower, and Porterfield gets to the pitch and pushes with a full face of the pat down the ground past mid-off for his second four, nice shot
fuller again outside off stump, he gets the front leg to the pitch again but mistimes his drive this time, hitting it too hard and failing to beat cover
short of a length outside leg stump, he whips that in the air wide of square leg and picks up three as Chawla gives chase and hauls it back in
back of a length on the stumps, he shuffles and works that straight to square leg
lovely delivery, pitching on a good length outside off stump and moving away from the left-hander, perfect seam movement
back of a length, moving in this time and Porterfield stands and runs that to point, not played all that confidently
good ball, a length on off stump, and another good forward defensive from the batsman
bad ball, a half-tracker way down leg stump and Karthik does well to reach that behind the stumps
fuller, moves in and Porterfield gets over it and works it to the man at square leg
good length outside off stump, pushed hurriedly to point
back of a length outside off stump, he drives off the back foot and the debutant Sharma dives well and stops it in the covers
back of a length again and this time he gets back and punches but cant beat the field
back of a length except its down leg stump and Joyce works that around the corner for one
short of a length outside off stump, he punches into the covers where Sharma does well again, diving full length to his right and pulling off a stop
a bit of width offered outside off stump and Porterfield rocks back and cuts, but cant beat backward point
beaten! Quicker one marginally outside off stump, he again gets back and cuts but the ball lifts up more than expected and he so nearly could have edged that
just back of a length outside off stump and Joyce stands and loosely defends, getting an inside-edge back onto the front boot
no swing, strays down leg stump and he flicks down to fine leg
fuller and moving into the stump, he shuffles and gets beaten by the slowness, ends up stepping outside off stump and flicking in the air but it lands just short of Dravid at mid-on
angling down leg stump, he flicks but ends up with a leg-bye
shorter outside off stump, he plays away from his body and mistimes the cut shot into the covers
full outside leg stump, he flicks, there's a noise clearly but Bowden signals wide
good length outside off stump, pushed into the off side
good length just outside off stump, and a frustrated Porterfield swings across the line, only finding the man at midwicket
lifts off a length on middle and stump, moves away and catches him high on the knee roll
lands on a length, moves away and Porterfield thinks about playing at it but does well to hold the bat back, good lift off the surface for Agarkar
back of a length again, no movement, Porterfield dabs that to point, no chance of a run and the frustration showing now
this one's short on middle and leg and he pulls hard, into the ground, for one behind square leg, excellent running from Porterfield gets two
good ball, on a length smack on the stumps, stays low and Porterfield just gets bat on it
shot man, getting to the pitch and driving a half-volley outside off stump between cover and mid-off for four
wide down leg stump, easy call by the umpire, RP struggling
back of a length just outside off stump, his feet dont go anywhere as he defends it and the inside-edge back onto the front good saves him
lifter outside off stump which he chases, only to get beaten
straighter delivery on off stump and Joyce flicks across the line into the gap at square leg
drags in the long-hop which Joyce pulls into the ground at midwicket
good length outside off stump, he stands and defends with another inside-edge
back of a length outside off stump and he just dabs that in front of point and calls for the single, good running between these two
lands on a great length and he can only push that to point uneasily
again that good length outside off stump and Joyce pushes to Yuvraj at point
extra effort from Agarkar, bouncing one very short and wide of off stump, forcing Karthik to leap up and take it above his head
now its the slower one, full outside off stump and staying a bit low as Joyce stands leaden-footed and reaches out for it
good ball, landing on a great length and drawing him into a nothing drive, no movement of the feet and he's beaten all ends up
now its straight on the stumps and he nudges it wide of Sreesanth at mid-on for one to keep hold of the strike
begins on the spot just outside off stump, Joyce stands and defends to cover
driveable length outside off stump, but Joyce's effort cant beat cover or mid-off
good stuff, getting over a full delivery on the stumps and flicking well through midwicket for four, nice roll of the wrists and power too
another good shot, as he gets up on the toes and drives a shorter delivery through the covers for a brace
edged and gone! Joyce plays away to one outside off stump, opening the face of the bat, and the offer is snapped up well by Ganguly at second slip, moving to his left
good length outside off stump, O'Brien comes forward and defends
slower ball goes all wrong, ending up way down leg stump for a wide
full in the blockhole outside off stump, swings in through the air, batsman drives and gets an inside-edge, but Agargar lets out a huge appeal
back of a length outside off stump, pitches and moves past the outside edge of the bat
good length this time, and he hurriedly defends back to Agarkar
too full on leg stump, Porterfield just walks across his stumps and flicks that past Karthik for four, and leg-byes are the call from the umpire
back of a length outside off stump, he gets forward and checks his shot to cover
good ball! Lands a touch fuller and Porterfield plays all over it, the ball pitches and seams past him into Karthik's gloves
good length outside off stump, and O'Brien gets off the mark with a confident push off the front foot into the covers
back of a length, seaming away from him, and he leaves it be
driveable length, tad slower, he comes forward and checks the drive to mid-off
good length, drawing him forward, and he ends up working it to midwicket via the inside-edge
back of a length on middle and off, he gets up and taps it to the man at square leg
looking for the yorker, he overpitches outside off stump and O'Brien drives to mid-off
length ball on middle and leg, he shuffles and works it off the pads but cant beat Gambhir at square leg
cleaned up by the yorker! Agarkar lands it as perfect as can be, full and moving in the air and it goes right through Porterfield, excellent delivery
good ball first up, fullish outside off stump and he just hangs his bat out to get beaten
strays down leg stump, and Wilson, with an extravagantly high back-lift, tries to flick but has to settle for a leg-bye as Karthik does the fielding himself
good movement off the seam, wide of off stump and O'Brien chases it to get beaten
straighter delivery on off stump, he closes the bat face and the ball rolls to square leg
good length outside off stump, he dabs that to point
back of a length outside off stump, hint of away movement, he stands and shoulders arms
good length outside off stump, defended to the off side
good length again, pushed to the covers
lifts off a good length and Wilson drives loosely, beaten by the pace and extra carry
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and runs that off the edge of the bat down to third man
full outside off stump, he drives with minimal foot movement and gets a thick outside edge in the gap at gulley down to third man
good length outside off stump, moves away and beats him as he goes for the dab
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes to point
full and way outside off stump, he reaches out and squeezes it through the gully region
hops up to defend one outside off stump
lands outside off stump and shaves past the outer edge of the bat as he hangs it out away from the body
loosener, full and would have been called wide of O'Brien hadnt reached out and slapped that to point
straighter one on off stump, Wilson works that in front of the front leg to square leg
fuller outside off stump, overstepping, and O'Brien gets forward in defence
back of a length outside off stump, O'Brien drives to point
a little wider of off stump and O'Brien steps out to steer it to point again
gets this one to angle past him, and it was very near to taking the edge of the bat as O'Brien lunged forward
good length this time, he shuffles across but has to defend back to Ganguly
tossed up on the stumps, he gets back and defends uncertainly
lobbed up outside off stump, good flight, he comes forward and defends as it dips on him
similar delivery, Wilson looking to come onto the front foot and drive, ends up defending
pitches on middle and off and Wilson gets a good stride forward and hammers it over midwicket, aggressive shot
flatter outside off stump, he waits for it and runs it wide of backward point for two
tossed up outside off stump, left alone
heave ho! O'Brien dances down the track and flays the bat, getting beaten all ends up
angled across the stumps, O'Brien stands and chases it this time, struggling against the movement and the angle from Ganguly
identical delivery and this time his feet move, but he runs it to Yuvraj at backward point
back of a length outside off stump, he stands up and slashes to Yuvraj's right, who does well to get to it and save the single
this time he reaches out and steers it in the air well wide of Yuvraj, and with no gully in place, O'Brien ends up with one down to third man
slower one outside off stump, Wilson gets a stride and a look in before shouldering arms
flighted up on the stumps, he uses the feet and works it from off stump to short midwicket
well tossed up on off stump, good roll of the wrists gets him one just wide of square leg
flatter, spins away outside off stump and Wilson slaps the loose delivery in the gap behind point for four
flipper spins in from outside off stump and does too much down leg stump for the umpire to uphold the appeal
wrong un goes on, and he gets behind the line and pushes to cover
flatter trajectory on off stump, Wilson gets right behind it and defends back to Chawla
again O'Brien eyes up midwicket and charges down the track, Ganguly gets it to slant past him and he is nowhere near the ball as he swings the bat
a tad fuller and this time O'Brien prefers to get over it and defend to cover
width offered but the pace is slow and O'Brien cant time his cut shot, getting an under-edge that lands safely in front of the 'keeper
back of a length outside off stump and he defends it back down the track
lands on leg stump and swings away from him, he gets behind the ball and presents a full face of the bat
back of a length outside off stump, good stuff from Gangs, as O'Brien defends to mid-off to round off the maiden over

bowled 'em! Chawla unveils another good googly, tossed up and spinning past Wilson, who gets half-forward and flicks across the line only to hear the rattle of timber behind him, Chawla loves it, well bowled!
tossed up on the stumps, he gets forward and defends
good flight on that one, landing on off stump and O'Brien defends
flatter delivery outside off stump, he goes back and pushes to point
good legspinner on off stump, O'Brien gets on top of it and defends it down to the off side
quicker one on the stumps, and its defended to midwicket
good ball on off stump, defended to point
a bit too short on the stumps, and in a flash O'Brien rocks into position and pulls through square leg for four
a bit wider of off stump, O'Brien reaches into the shot and picks the gap at point
good length delivery outside off stump which is left alone
bends his back a little and gets one to sit up outside off stump but O'Brien still isnt interested
touch short on off stump and its pulled backward of square, Agarkar at fine leg does the fielding
tossed up, O'Brien uses the feet and is beaten in the flight, ends up chipping this over mid-off for a couple
tossed up, this time he gets forward in stoic defence
aggression gets the better of him, as he plants the leg out and sweeps hard in front of the pad, getting under it and slogging up into air for RP to hold a simple catch at square leg
flatter just outside off stump, O'Brien flicks into midwicket for one
flatter delivery on middle stump, White shuffles across and works this to short fine leg
looped up well out the back of the hand, landing it on off stump, and O'Brien defends back to Chawla
good length delivery on off stump which White defends back to Ganguly
comes in off the seam from off stump and catches him on the knee roll as he shuffles across in an attempt to manufacture runs to leg
good length outside off stump, and an uneasy White looks to work it across the stumps again but cant
good length on the stumps, he plays with soft hands to pick up a sharp single into midwicket
short and wide, he chases it but cant beat cover-point
back of a length, he drives out to cover sweeper for one
tossed-up, on the leg, pushed towards midwicket for a run
on the off stump line, pushes forward to dead-bat it away
loopy delivery, on the middle, White takes out the left leg from the line and sweeps it past square leg
flatter, faster, outside off stump, leans forward, pushes to right of  Gambhir at mid on. Direct hit at non-striker's end but he is safe
lands on the off peg line, bounds off the pad to Dravid at first slip. Karthik appeals but christmas or diwali  is not around the corner
goes back to a slightly short of length delivery and whips it past square leg

lands on a length, around the off stump, comes in a touch and defended down the track. Gentle seam-up stuff. You are not , as a batsman, going to stay up in the night worrying about Ganguly but he does the job
fuller, driven to mid on
full and it bends in around middle and leg, White leans forward, gets his bat around the front pad and turns it past square leg
pushes it wide off the off stump and wide is called. Ganguly looks a bit surprised about the call. Fair call, if you ask me
gets it closer to the off stump, left alone. Ireland meandering along here.
similar line - again outside the off stump, White is tempted,flirts but its not a fatal mistake
fullish, outside the off stump, White lunges forward and pushes it limply to the off side
flighted one, full, on the middle, flicked with the turn but straight to man adjacent to the square-leg umpire
leans forward to defend.
slower, full and on the middle and leg, O'Brien paddles it away to fine leg
attempts to flight, sends across a dolly of a full-toss instead, but shoved to right of midwicket where Yuvraj dives to make a smart stop
from round the stumps and drifts down the leg side.
tossed up on middle and leg, O'Brien shuffles across and turns it straight to the fielder at square leg
flighted delivery, O'Brien goes down the track, reaches the pitch, drives to long on. Drinks break
and he begins with a wide, the batsman unable to reach that one
angles down leg stump second ball in a row, another wide
overpitched outside off stump, nicely driven to mid-on where Dravid moves quickly and gets his left hand out to save runs
back of a length outside off stump, O'Brien opens the face of the bat and runs it down to Agarkar at third man
angled across the stumps, a bit too wide and thats exactly what umpire Bowden signals
better stuff, closer to the stumps as it angles past White, who decides to leave it be
a bit of width offered and White cuts to Yuvraj at backward point, who misfields and gives up one
straighter on off stump, and too full, O'Brien covers it and on-drives nicely past mid-on, Ganguly gives chase but cant haul it in, top shot
quicker delivery on a shorter length just outside off stump, this time O'Brien shapes to swipe through the on side but the ball catches him on the upper thigh and rolls to point
tossed up gently, White drives hard to mid-off
straighter one on off stump, White gets behind the ball and defends it back
looped up on off stump, this time its a reverse-sweep straight to Yuvraj at backward point
tossed up on middle and leg, defended back to Chawla
well flighted outside off stump, spins away and beats his attempted drive
flatter one spins down leg and White cant work it past short fine leg, good tidy over again from the legspinner
good ball, landing on a great length and lifting off the surface to beat O'Brien off the back foot, totally squared up by the movement and "Oh my word!" is the reaction from Karthik
straighter delivery on off stump, he defends with little footwork and gets an inside-edge
fuller outside off stump, White drops the hands and the ball rolls to point
full and wide, he reaches out and square-drives streakily through the gap at gully
moves in and squares him up a bit, drawing a thick outside edge all along the ground to third man
a bit of room on offer, but White mistimes his attempted back-foot cut into the ground in front of point
flat on the stumps, O'Brien comes out and takes it on the full, flicking to mid-on
straighter one outside off stump, White goes back and pushes to cover

egded and another good take from Karthik, as Chawla loops one up invitingly outside off stump, White goes for a booming drive away from the body, and gets an outside edge which the 'keeper snaps up on the move
spins down leg stump, Johnston plonks the foot forward and misses
tossed up again, and thats a good-looking drive straight to cover
quicker one on middle and leg, Johnston looks to work it leg-side but ends up playing it back to Chawla
back of a length on off stump, and its driven back to the bowler loosely
back of a length outside off stump, he goes for the cut and gets beaten
strays down leg stump, O'Brien flicks down to fine leg for one
good length outside off stump, Johnston comes onto the front foot and drives to point
driveable length and he goes for the shot, but an athletic Sharma flings himself around in the covers to deny Johnston runs
similar delivery, this time he comes forward and drives straight to mid-on
tossed up, O'Brien skips out of his crease and drives right to the man at cover
tossed up on the stumps, again he comes out and works this one to midwicket
spins away outside off stump, Johnston gets on top and cuts to point
stays low outside off stump, Johnston covers it and leaves it alone
well flighted outside off stump, he gets a good look at it and leaves it be
tossed up straight on the stumps and Johnston sweeps it out to deep backward square leg
good bouncer outside off stump beats Johnston on the attempted front-foot hook/pull/whatever you want to call it
short of a length delivery outside off stump, he chases it and gets beaten, which excites Agarkar something fierce
back of a length this time, he stands and drops the hands, getting an inside-edge to leg
low full toss outside off stump which should've been drilled through the covers, but Johnston finds Sharma instead
driveable length, Johnston obliges but again fails to beat the men inside the circle, driving to RP at mid-off
short of a length on middle and leg, O'Brien adjust and uses the soft hands for a good tip-and-run to midwicket
tossed up on middle and leg, and O'Brien reverse-sweeps past Ganguly at backward point, who allows the ball to go through him for two
flatter on middle and off, worked straight to midwicket
comes out of his box and lifts this over mid-on down to the man in the deep on two bounces
slower one, the legspinner outside off stump which Johnston thinks about playing but resists
faster one spins in from outside off stump, Johnston gets a good stride forward
fizzed up outside off stump, Johnston plays and misses, Karthik whips off the bails and asks the question, but he was inside the line
slowly lobbed up on leg stump and its watchfully patted back to Tendulkar
tossed up the off spinner, O'Brien comes out to drive but gets deceived by the flight and adjusts to defend
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to square leg
quicker one outside off stump, he gets down and sweeps but gets hit on the leg, a leg-bye is scampered
quicker one, seam-up, lands well wide of off stump
good length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
identical delivery, Johnston looks to drive but mistimes the shot
back of a length outside off stump, punched off the back foot to cover
back of a length again, he stands and slashes, getting an under-edge that doesnt carry into Karthik's gloves
fuller this time, and an impetuous O'Brien slogs across the line to midwicket
awesome biff, Johnston making room and clouting a short delivery cleanly over deep midwicket for the first six of the innings, crowd loves it
slower one on the stumps, he on-drives but straight to the fielder
good ball, yorker in the zone to deny Johnston a single off the last ball
full on leg stump, he gets down and sweeps down to Chawla at fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, Johnston smacks this over mid-on and Agarkar, covering ground from long-on, does very well to stop it on the ropes
slower one outside off stump, he waits for it and dabs it to backward point, a good throw comes in but he's safely down the other end
innocuous delivery, he comes out and mistimes the chip over covers and picks up two
tossed up outside leg stump, he just nudges the off-cutter into midwicket to run one
angled outside leg stump, Johnston tries the sweep, Sachin appeals in vain, end of the over
full toss on leg stump, Johnston surprised by it as he backs away, ends up chipping towards midwicket
backs away, gets a full toss outside off stump, which he smears through the covers out to Ganguly in the deep, who fires in the throw to the wrong end
slower ball in the blockhole, driven back to Sreesanth's right, he gets a hand out to it and does well to atleast take some pace off the shot
sees him coming, changes the grip, pitching it slower and wide, Porterfield reaches but cant connect
backs away again, connecting decently and hitting it on the up over mid-off, Ganguly has some running to do and hauls it in as the ball slows up in the deep
bouncer down leg stump, Johnston goes for the hook, misses, and after a delayed reaction, umpire Benson signals wide
good length outside off stump, slower ball, cut to point
drifts down leg stump, he misses out on the shot but scampers a leg-bye even as Sreesanth bellows out a highly optimistic appeal, much to Mark Benson's amusement
tossed up, he comes forward and chips over mid-off, RP runs in from the deep an dives forward, but doest judge it, as the ball lands short of him
slower one, he comes forward and defends
flatter, sees Johnston come out and fires it down leg, but its taken on the full and chipped wide of mid-on
tossed up, he clears the leg and sweeps from outside off stump and picks up two out to Ganguly in the deep to raise Ireland's 150
skips out, picking one more from outside off stump and slamming it over midwicket for four
quicker one outside off stump, O'Brien makes room and has to adjust to drive to cover
comes out and looks to smoke one over the onside but makes a total hash of it, beaten all ends up
slower delivery, back of a length, O'Brien backs away and then drops it at his feet, but as RP Singh swoops in Johnston sends him back
solid shot, getting to his fourth ODI fifty with a clean strike back down the ground to long-on, well played

looking to flick one over the infield, he shuffles across his stumps, closes the face of the bat and gets a leading-edge way up in the air to mid-off, Sharma moves across from extra cover and holds onto it for his first catch in ODIs
good length outside off stump, pushed into the covers
clears the leg and swipes the ball to midwicket
low full toss outside off stump, which Johnston cant put away as he just works it to midwicket
good length on off stump, squares him up, leading edge to Yuvraj at point, who needlessly fires in a throw to the nonstrikers end which allows the single
makes room, drives over extra cover, the ball drops in front of Ganguly, who gets confused as he over-runs it and sees the ball spin past him
full in the zone, driven to mid-on
good lifter outside off stump, sitting up a good height and McCallan arches the back to let it pass
straight on the stumps, he flicks behind square and runs very hard to pick up three
pitches outside leg stump, sits up a tad which catches McCallan by surprise as he tries to nudge it to the on-side, RP fields
makes room, the ball lands outside leg stump and squares him up again, popping up into the off side, another crucial dot ball
bang on target, no room on offer from RP, McCallan can only drive back to the bowler
cleaned up, as McCallan walks across his stumps, clearly trying to cheekily lap it down to fine leg, but the ball wins this battle
full outside off stump, not enough room to drive, and Fourie defends his first ball in ODIs
good pace and bounce, carrying on over the stumps as he leaves it, end of a good spell from RP, who actually pats himself on the back as he takes his cap back and walks out to the deep
good length outside off stump, driven into the covers
angles down leg stump, beats him for pace as he tries to nudge it fine, the ball bobbing up in front of point
overpitched outside off stump, Johnston drives hard down to Ganguly moving around from long-off
full in the blockhole, he flicks across the line but cant beat the fielders
slower ball, driveable length, Fourie pushes it off the front foot to mid-off for one
slower one goes wrong as he sees Johnston back away, ends up bowling it very wide of off stump
good shot, standing and driving it straight back down the ground for four, crucial runs for Ireland
shuffles across, Sreesanth bowls it wide down leg stump, 16th of the innings
full toss outside off stump, comes forward and slices it past point to Gambhir in the deep
makes room and powerfully creams this over mid-on for a flat six, second for the big man Johnston
low full toss on middle and off, driven down to long-off
slower yorker outside off stump, Fourie walks down the track and ends up floored by it, playing over it and falling down
full on middle and leg, flicked out past mid-on for one

fullish outside off stump, Johnston backs away and ends up slicing it in the air over cover, the ball spirals up in the air, Tendulkar and Yuvraj converge, backward point calls for it and judges it excellently to give Sreesanth his third wicket
tossed up on off stump, he mistimes his drive
quicker one wide of off stump, he waits for it and plays it late past Karthik, and with no protection at third man thats four
quicker one spins past the bat outside off stump, well bowled
good variation, as this one spins in and beats everyone, spinning past leg stump
quicker one again, he dabs it into the covers and sprints one
and with the last ball of the innings, Tendulkar gets his 150th ODI wicket as Whelan comes out, is beaten, and Karthik whips off the bails

inn2.comm: begins with one down leg stump, Ganguly tries to flick but ball clips pads and runs away for four
better stuff, good length on off stump, Ganguly defends it down towards point
overpitched outside off stump and he pushes that into the covers for runs off the bat, and the smattering of a crowd goes berzerk
good length outside off stump, seams in as Tendulkar gets a stride forward and shoulders arms
full toss outside off stump, gift-wrapped for someone of Tendulkar's class, and he doesnt miss out, driving it through cover-point for four

got 'em! Whelan you beauty! The debutant follows up the freebie with a full delivery outside off stump that nips through Tendulkar as he flicks across the line, what a wicket for the young Irish bowler in his first over
back of a length outside off stump, real slow one, which he reaches out to and taps in front of point
similar delivery, closer to the stumps, defended
straight on the stumps, Ganguly shuffles and works that to midwicket
overpitched outside off stump and Ganguly drives confidently to mid-off
short of a length this time, and he drives off the back foot to mid-off
back of a length outside leg stump, worked behind square for one
good length on middle and off, driven to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly drops the hands and runs it fine but Porterfield at backward point is quick
back of a length on leg stump, hits Gambhir high on the knee roll, a mild appeal from the bowler
similar delivery but this time Gambhir gets bat on it, turning it so square leg
third ball in a row, landing on and around leg stump, Gambhir picks this through midwicket for a couple
overpitched outside off stump, Gambhir square-drives past point but doesnt time it all that well, the ball holds up as Porterfield gives chase
good length on off stump, he comes forward and defends it back down the track
loose full toss on off stump, which Gambhir dispatches down the ground past mid-on for four, a nice punch shot played softly
this one nips up off a shorter length, slanted across him, and he plays at it for a thick leading edge through gully that fetches him two more
fuller on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
good length delivery on the stumps, no room on offer, Gambhir gets his head down and just pats that back to Fourie
full outside off stump, he reaches out and steers that down to third man for one to keep strike
back of a length, pitching on middle and leg and moving away, Gambhir drops the hands and defends to point
good length this time, moving past him, he gets forward and defends to point again

quicker delivery, kicking off leg stump and moving towards off, beating Gambhir's prod, there's a noise as ball passes bat and they all go up in appeal after the 'keeper collects, but Bowden is unmoved
good stuff, pitching outside off stump and straightening enough to beat Gambhir again
too full this time outside leg stump, easy enough for Gambhir to pick that up and flick backward of square
overcompensates with one full and wide outside off stump
another wide, landing well outside leg stump as Gambhir looks to flick but misses
pitches on a good length outside leg stump, Gambhir plays at it and gets a leading edge along the ground past point for a streaky single
good length just outside off stump, he comes forward and just defends to cover
pitches on that same length, just wider this time, allowing Gambhir room to get across and shoulder arms
short, wide, cut hard but its that man Porterfield at point, flinging himself to his right and saving runs, one-handed
good length outside off stump, defended to Porterfield
pitches on leg stump and moves across Gambhir, who drops the hands and defends it towards Porterfield once more
straighter delivery on middle and leg, worked to midwicket and Ganguly wants the single this time as he's been down the other end for some time now, but Gambhir wisely resists
back of a length on off stump, pushed in front of cover and Gambhir calls for the run
overpitched on off stump, Ganguly presents the full face of the bat and pushes past mid-off for two
half-volley outside off stump, put away with flair through the covers, all class
good length this time, Ganguly steadies himself and pushes to point, but says 'NO' to Gambhir
better length, moving across him and drawing him forward, the outer edge sneaks past gully for one
really, truly full and wide but Gambhir's reached-out drive is intercepted by that man Porterfield
lands on about leg stump, Ganguly just turns the wrists and picks up one to short fine leg
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and defends to cover
back of a length this time, Gambhir gets up on the toes and defends to cover again

good length, pitching on off stump and moving away, Gambhir gets forward and defends, the ball clips the top of the pad through to the 'keeper, very good decision from umpire Benson as everyone in green goes up in appeal for caught behind
back of a length outside off stump, he looks to defend and gets an inside-edge to leg
good length outside off stump, left alone
good length outside off stump, left alone
back of a length outside off stump, steered to backward point
angles across him, pitching wide and Gambhir leaves it be, then looks to the umpire but no response there
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and taps it to point, wants the run but is sent back by Ganguly as Porterfield swoops in
poor ball, too wide down leg stump and Gambhir clips it fine for four
full on leg stump, he clips well but square leg pulls off a great effort to save runs
good length on the stumps, he comes forward and turns it to midwicket, uninterested in running
short of a length outside off stump, he gets up tall and steers that to backward point
gets a step out, bowler bangs it in quicker and Ganguly adjusts to defend off the back foot
slower ball on the stumps, Ganguly tries to hammer it away over the on-side but misses out, gets an inside-edge
fuller outside off stump, he pokes at it and ends up with another inside-edge, this time for one to short fine leg
short and wide but he cant put it away, cutting to Porterfield once again
fullish outside off stump, Ganguly gets forward and pushes that through the covers for a couple
full again, this time he drives straight to cover
overpitched outside off stump, he gets forward and drives but again finds the man at cover
overpitched once more, and this time Ganguly picks the gap between cover and mid-off with a gentle drive to raise the 50
just a touch slower but still on that driveable length, Ganguly finds extra cover this time
sixth ball in a row, fullish outside off stump, Ganguly comes forward and drills that past mid-off for another boundary
back of a length slanting past off stump, left alone by Gambhir
too much on leg stump, but Gambhir cant beat square leg
good ball! Lands on a great  length, seams across the stumps and beats Gambhir, on the hop
too short and wide, and he's lucky Gambhir's fierce cut is cut off down on the ropes by Whelan, running around quickly from third man
short of a length, Ganguly gets up on the toes and defends to point
effort ball, quicker and seaming off a short length, tempting Ganguly to fish away from the body and get beaten
short of a length on off stump, he steers it to backward point where...yes, you guessed it...Porterfield cuts it off
fullish this time, he drives away from his body and gets a thick inside-edge past leg stump
overpitched, Ganguly eases into a square-drive for two that brings up the 50-run partnership
short of a length outside off stump, he gets up and opens the face, running the ball down to third man
good length outside off stump, comes forward and defends to point
good length again, defended to cover
comes down the track, bowler drops short, Ganguly spars at the ball of a length and gets beaten
fullish this time, defended to the off side
straighter one this time, tucked to midwicket
pitches on leg stump, Ganguly works this wide of midwicket for a quick single
short of a length, moving away from middle and leg, Gambhir gets up and controls it down to third man for one

pitches outside leg stump, Ganguly tries to tuck it off the pads, ball rolls to short fine leg off the pad, Ganguly sets off down the track but Gambhir isnt interested, and he has to turn and dive to make his ground
slants across him off a length and he leaves it be, Niall O'Brien fumbles the take
short of a length on off stump, cut well but straight to Porterfield
short of a length just outside off stump, Gambhir plays it late and runs it down to third man for a single
makes room and tries to take the aerial route over the in-field but makes a mess of it, luckily for him he manages to clear mid-off
lands on a good length outside off stump, this time Ganguly gets forward and drives to mid-off for one
good length outside off stump, no real pace, Gambhir leaves it be
comes down the track again, heaves across the line, and gets a thick french cut past leg stump for four, plucky innings here
good length outside off stump, comes forward and pushes to cover
short of a length angled across off stump, Ganguly leaves it alone
back of a length on middle and leg, defended to the leg side
pitches on leg stump and swings away, Ganguly pokes at it and the ball clips him high above the knee roll
leg-stump line again from Johnston, Ganguly shuffles and works it to square leg
shot! O'Brien drops in a long-hop on off stump and Gambhir pulls over midwicket for four
back of a length outside off stump, Gambhir watches it into the 'keeper's gloves
good length outside off stump, he drives via the inside-edge to mid-on
slower delivery, a tad fuller, Gambhir drives it to backward point
marginally back of a length outside off stump and Gambhir rolls the wrists over it, finding the gap through gully for two
again there's room on offer and Gambhir cuts down to third man for the single
charges down the track, Johnston bounces it wide of off stump and beats Gambhir
good length on this occasion, Gambhir gets forward and defends to cover
short of a length outside leg stump, he looks to work it fine but misses
super shot, getting to the pitch of one outside off stump and driving straight back past the stumps for four
short of a length outside off stump, Gambhir shoulders arms this time
back of a length, angling past him, he gets forward and defends
overpitched outside off stump, Gambhir drives back down the ground but mid-on moves across quickly and cuts it off before it gets to long-off
tossed up on the stumps, Gambhir uses the feet and drives through the covers for three...this is a slow outfield now after the rain
tossed up on leg stump, spins down but Ganguly cant beat short fine leg
tossed up on leg stump, Ganguly's already backed away so ends up pushing to cover
tossed up on off stump, Ganguly defends
the arm ball lands on leg stump, Ganguly tucks it to leg
full and flat down leg stump, he pokes it to square leg and sets off
backs away and looks to carve him away, but the balls too short and he somehow manages to get bat onto it, it rolls to the 'keeper
back of a good length outside off stump, he gets up and defends to cover
overpitched outside off stump, he streakily square-drives in the air towards backward point, Porterfield throws himself to his right but just misses, wouldve been an awesome catch
short of a length, he steers it down to third man for one
back of a good length angled across the stumps, Ganguly shuffles and gets squared up by the extra lift
angled across him again, this time he stands and tries to open the face but gets beaten
tossed up on the stumps, he comes out and takes it on the full, whipping it to midwicket
flatter outside off stump, he initially comes forward but then rocks back and drives to point
tossed up, he uses the feet and flashes the drive in the gap at cover and this time picks up four
flat on leg stump, Gambhir looks to work it fine but gets a leading-edge to the off side
fired flat down leg stump, this time he picks it away to midwicket and calls for the run, Ganguly just makes his ground
tossed up on leg stump, defended to the on side
shimmies down the track, expansively driving away from his body and getting beaten outside off stump
pitches outside leg stump, Gambhir nudges it in front of midwicket for one, leg bye is the call from the umpire
back of a good length on the stumps, Ganguly gets behind the line and pushes back down the track
oh ho, Ganguly! Makes room to leg again, Johnston adjusts with one short and wide, and Ganguly reaches out to it and misses completely
good ball, cramping him for room on about middle and leg and Ganguly takes it in  the midriff, the ball running towards backward point
a bit of room offered now, and he cuts well down to third man for one
tossed up, spins into him, he makes room and drives to point
the arm ball, he plays for turn and has to adjust
another arm ball, fractionally outside off stump, Gambhir shuffles and pushes into the covers for one
tossed up on leg stump, he comes forward and nudges it into the gap for one and India's 100 is raised
flights up the arm ball, Gambhir comes out but ends up defending it back to McCallan
good stuff, cramping him for room and drawing the defensive shot back down the track
wide outside leg stump, Ganguly shuffles and picks him for one down to fine leg
pushed across him off a length, he stands and pokes at it, beaten
drifts down leg stump, Gambhir eases that around the corner off the hips to reach his third ODI fifty, well played
again that poor outside leg line, Ganguly taps it to short fine leg for one more
slower, off a shorter length outside off stump, he opens the face late and dabs it to third man
back of a length on middle and leg, Ganguly works it through midwicket for two
flat down leg stump, Gambhir backs away in an attempt to go off-side, and ends up with an inside-edge to short fine leg
well tossed up on middle and leg, Ganguly is beaten in the flight and pops it back to McCallan, who cant get to it
flat outside off stump, Ganguly drives into the coverds
shorter, flatter on leg stump, he swivels into position and pulls into square leg
backs away to leg, McCallan fires it flat and he defends it back
quicker arm ball on leg stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
lovely ball on return! Pitches on a great  length and moves in from outside off stump, beating Gambhir who pokes at it off the back foot, squared up
a little bit of room now, and he cuts through gully for one
straighter ball, delivered from wide of the stumps, Ganguly gets up and defends it back to Whelan
comes out, Whelan bowls a yorker, and not for the first time in this innings does Ganguly escape with an inside-edge past leg stump
so close, so far, as Ganguly gets forward and pushes one over the in-field, mid-off backpeddles and jumps up but the ball just evades his fingertips
fuller one, driven into the covers this time
flat on leg stump, Gambhir comes out and whips across the line, calls of 'catch it' but its wide of midwicket
arm ball on middle and leg, driven to long-on for one and he goes to 49
fired full and wide down leg stump, Gambhir tries the sweep but misses
quicker one on leg stump, he advances and drives streakily to midwicket
flatter one outside off stump, he gets back and cuts hard to point
bowled full and flat on the stumps, Ganguly digs it out to cover
there's another ODI fifty, No. 68, as Ganguly pushes into in front of point for a single, much to the crowd's pleasure
back of a length outside off stump, pushed uneasily to point
he moves back over the stumps, bowling one on a length and its pushed to the off side for one
pitches it outside leg stump, Gambhir flicks off the hips for one to fine leg
walks across the stumps, trying to pull a short delivery outside leg stump, but cant connect
back of a good length on middle and leg, he stands and turns it to the on side, takes a few steps down but turns back as midwicket swoops in
shuffles across and takes a full delivery on leg stump for maximum, lofting it over long-on, a short-arm jab with enough power on it
slants past him and he reaches out with zero footwork, getting beaten
flat outside off stump, he steers that backward of point for one
tossed up outside off stump, Ganguly pushes that towards point
flat on the stumps, he uses the feet and drives past mid-off for an easy single
flat down leg stump, Ganguly just drops that at his feet and calls for the one
slower arm ball on the stumps, Gambhir defends
backs away to leg, McCallan follows him but he drives to point safely
back of a length just outside off stump, Gambhir gets up and pokes that to point, Ganguly doesnt want the run
stand-and-deliver shot, seeing it in the slot and going through with a clean strike over mid-on for four
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to backward point
back of a length, again he pokes that to backward point and cant get a run
overpitched on leg stump, whipped out to the man on the ropes
shot! Ganguly comes down the track and clouts this one over midwicket for a disdainful four
tossed up on middle and leg, defended
tossed up, uses the feet well but cant beat cover
full and flat on leg stump, whipped out to deep backward square leg
full in the zone, Ganguly uses the feet well and drives to mid-off for one
shuffles around in his crease, does Gambhir, and McCallan chases him with one down leg stump, ends up defending it
full and flat outside off stump, he makes room for himself and comes out, driving through the covers for a couple
full on middle and leg, shuffles and clips to midwicket for one
slower ball, full on off stump, he lazily flicks across the line to midwicket
a little short and wide, Gambhir crunches a firm cut but Porterfield intercepts
comes out of his box, cutting a wide delivery up and over backward point for four
fuller delivery down leg stump, tucked to short fine leg
heave ho! Gambhir wants to go back inside! This time he takes a full delivery outside leg stump and heaves it away over square leg for four more
backs away, McCallan fires it full and Ganguly defends it back
flatter outside off stump, driven to point for one
pitches on middle and leg and spins away from Gambhir, who ends up defending
tossed up on off stump, Gambhir comes forward and defends
flatter arm ball, Gambhir exposes the stumps and then steers it to backward point
arm ball goes awry as McCallan spears one well down leg stump
makes room to cut, the arm ball is slower than expected and Ganguly has to adjust, ends up cutting late towards backward point
back of a length outside off stump and Ganguly caresses it through the covers
straight ball on the stumps, Gambhir whips across the line for one
good length outside off stump, he eases into a square-drive for one
tossed up, he comes out and defends towards mid-off, good running gets them one
straighter one comes onto him quickly and he defends it back
flat outside off stump, Ganguly gets forward and steers it towards backward point
drifts down leg stump and he helps it on its way down to fine leg
slants past him on a good length and beats his forward defensive
slower one outside off stump, Gambhir dabs it down to third man for one
now he gets aggro, swinging across the line and getting another inside-edge to fine leg
beaten by one moving past him as he tries to glide that to third man for the winning runs
full and wide outside off stump, thats what called too
